con:testCase.name: TestCase_Virt_OCS12
con:testCase.con:description:
Tests ocs12 mock with different responses http://mucsgsvn03.sg.de.pri.o2.com/svn/drcrepo/trunk/SRs/Interfaces/OCS/UNICA%20API%20-%20AA%20Provisioning%20-%20Balance%20Management_v1_0.doc and error messages based on interface documentation: svn://svn.sg.de.pri.o2.com/DealerPortal/DirectRecharge/trunk/SRs/Interfaces/OCS/UNICA API - AA Provisioning - Error Codes_v1_0.doc $ 3.1 and 3.2
MG: chanched mock at 15.04.2019: Decrement in negativ area are supported. negativeBalanceUsageFlag=true is contstant in drc-request to ocs12 totalFlag FlagType No ‘yes’ if the whole amount needs to be deducted. In this case, service exception “Insufficient balance? will be returned if the amount to be deducted is larger than available balance. negativeBalanceUsageFlag FlagType No Flag indicating whether a Negative Balance is granted or not. It only makes sense when totalFlag is activated.
